title: Is God the Father a Structure? Jordan Peterson, Bishop Barron,  God #1, Bib Ser 1 Commentary
description:
JBP lays out God #1 when he says to Bishop Barron "that structure (consciousness) is God the Father". Bishop Barron lets it go without comment. I also return to the Biblical Series because I think I can comment on it better after looking at Peterson intensively for over a year. 

Conversation in Audio Form https://www.wordonfire.org/peterson/
Biblical Series 1 https://youtu.be/f-wWBGo6a2w
JBP/SH/BW Vancouver 1 https://youtu.be/d-Z9EZE8kpo

#jordanpeterson #bishop barron #biblicalseries
End of Transactional Religion https://youtu.be/K4JmPPICgA4
Fatal Discord https://www.amazon.com/Fatal-Discord-Erasmus-Luther-Western-ebook/dp/B0796T43YF
Philosophy and Religion in the West https://www.amazon.com/Philosophy-Religion-West/dp/B00DTO5L0I
Becoming Truly Human https://www.amazon.com/Becoming-Truly-Human-Nathan-Jacobs/dp/B0759QXCCG
